attributes.action: Classify cryptocurrency revenues generated under winnings.
attributes.background: The new HMRC crypto tax is unjust.  I, as many others believe that we are merely "gambling" that this technology is going to be revolutionary.  However, there were MANY technologies that humanity has "BET" on in the past that didn't come to fruition. UK government is just trying to cover their bases

rejection.details:
Petitions need to ask the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
